text:
For all those who thought that #MeToo was just a wave that calmed down soon after it began, just know that the movement isn’t going away anytime soon.
After the Sanskari man of Bollywood, Alok Nath, was accused by producer-writer Vinta Nanda of rape, about 20 years ago during the time they both worked on TV show Tara, a rape case has been registered against him.
Twitter
Mumbai Police Additional CP Manoj Sharma has confirmed that Oshiwara Police has registered an FIR against Alok Nath under section 376 of IPC (rape) on the complaint filed by Writer Vinta Nanda.
Also Read: Sandhya Mridul Shares Spine-Chilling Details As She Accuses Alok Nath Of Sexual Harassment
Mumbai Police Additional CP Manoj Sharma says 'Oshiwara Police has registered an FIR against Alok Nath under section 376 of IPC (rape) on the complaint filed by Writer Vinta Nanda.' pic.twitter.com/m7A99o61Xt — ANI (@ANI) November 21, 2018
Don't Miss 1.4 K SHARES 3.9 K SHARES 6.8 K SHARES 7.8 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Vinta Nanda has shared in detail on social media about the incident that took place about 20 years ago. “I have waited for this moment to come for 19 years,” she said accusing the man who “is known as the most #Sanskaari (Cultured) person in the film and television industry.” She had named him in that post. But later, she filed a police complaint.
Also Read: Vinta Nanda Takes The Legal Route & Files Police Complaint After Accusing Alok Nath Of Rape
title: After Complaint By Producer-Writer Vinta Nanda, Mumbai Police File Rape Case Against Alok Nath
description: After the Sanskari man of Bollywood, Alok Nath, was accused by producer-writer Vinta Nanda od rape, about 20 years ago during the time they both worked on TV show Tara, a rape case has been registered against him. Mumbai Police Additional CP Manoj Sharma has confirmed that Oshiwara Police has registered an FIR against Alok Nath under section 376 of IPC (rape) on the complaint filed by Writer Vinta
